Purpose:
Purpose
Determine that panel title appears in the Tabs menu when a panel is
  added
Test steps:
Initial Conditions
None.

Steps/Description
Launch the browser From the Sidebar, select "Tabs | Customize Sidebar" Highlight any panel from the pane on the left and press the "Add"
    button to add the panel Press "OK" to close the window Now, click on the Tabs button in the Sidebar to open up a menu that
    lists all panels in the Sidebar The panel that you just added should also be listed (title shown)
    in the menu listing

Expected Results
Added panel should be listed in the Tabs menu
